sentences: Ma ütleksin, et see on hea idee.
Kui sa küsiks, siis ma ütleksin nõus olevat.
Tema ei ütleksin kunagi midagi sellist.
context: The word 'ütleksin' is the conditional mood (condicionalis) of the verb 'ütelda' in Estonian, meaning 'to say' or 'to speak'. It specifically refers to what one would say under certain conditions. The suffix '-ks-' forms the conditional tense, which expresses hypothetical future actions or possibilities. In this case, 'ütleksin' means 'I would say' and is used when discussing what someone might say in a particular situation.
